name: BeeMused
description:
Step right up! Enjoy this retro rollercoaster, with a BEE theme! Guide the tiny coaster through this big green flag adventure. You may collect some yellow honey along the way but avoid RED. Blue construction apparatuses help you win!!!

For the lo rez jam using PIX64 console; open PIX64 and navigate to BeeMused)

I'm trying to make more prototypes for game jam to see which ones (if any) you think could be turned into a fun multilevel game leave comments/feedback! I think this one could be further developed... Let me know, thanks.
